analyzed: smra byed kyang /_/'jig rten byol song mi go ji ltar bya/_/skye ba dang 'chi ba'i

analyzed: gnas ni kun rdzob pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/mchog gi sgras ni don dam pa ste

analyzed: pa'i rang bzhin de nyid ni/_/dngos dang dngos po ma yin te/_/gzhan yang

analyzed: rdzun pa'i rnal 'byor dang brdzun pa'i phyag rgyas/_mngon sum can la nye bar

analyzed: mkho ba med cing /_de kho na nyid ma rig pa dag la ni nges kyang long ba ltar

analyzed: mthong bar mi nus so/_/zhe na bden te/_'on kyang 'di ni/_mo gsham bu

analyzed: khams gsum pa'i rnam pa can me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_nam mkha'
translated: This direct perception is like a reflection in a mirror, and it has the aspect of the three realms. It is not a direct perception of space.🔽The supreme bliss that comes from that

analyzed: bsam gtan brdzun pas ci zhig bya/_don dam pa lkog tu gyur pa ni thabs

analyzed: las rigs par bya dgos kyis/_rang bzhin med par bsam pas ni mun pa'o/_/🔽rdzun pa de dang de dag thar pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes dgongs so/_/de la lhan

analyzed: phyis ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes sku gcig_/ces gsung ste/_gang zhig

analyzed: bdag dang dbang po dang /_/yul du 'dzin pa nub pa ni/_/nor bu byang chub

analyzed: zhig sogs la ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba dang /_nub pa med kyang /_yul phyogs
